bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
When installing texlive-bibexport there will be a dangling link
/usr/bin/bibexport.sh -> /usr/share/texlive/texmf-dist/scripts/bibexport.sh
which should not eb
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. dnf --setopt=clean_requirements_on_remove=0 remove texlive-bibexport 2. find -H /usr/bin/ -xtype l (returns nothing) 3. dnf install texlive-bibexport 3. find -H /usr/bin/ -xtype l
Actual results:
The find command yields
/usr/bin/bibexport.sh
Expected results:
nothing
Additional info:
Since texlive-bibexport-bin provides /usr/bin/bibexport, which is a link to the existing /usr/share/texlive/texmf-dist/scripts/bibexport/bibexport.sh, I guess bibexport.sh should not be linked into /usr/bin by texlive-bibexport.
Versions
texlive-bibexport-bin-svn16219.0-24.20150728_r37987.fc24.1.noarch texlive-bibexport-svn29349.3.01-24.fc24.1.noarch

perl-BibTeX-Parser-0.69-1.fc25, perl-LaTeX-ToUnicode-0.04-1.fc25, texlive-2016-5.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-50a2bc7997
